CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 出售；销售；销售额（sales）；销售活动；（尤指）拍卖；降价出售；大减价；销售部门（sales）；销售业务；销售工作（sales）

synonym.mean: 销售；出售；拍卖；销售额；廉价出售

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 畅销的；适于销售的；价格适当的

word_group.brief_definition: 供出售, 上市, 削价出售
面包或糕饼售买活动；糕饼义卖；义卖活动
火灾残留物品大拍卖；甩卖；大拍卖
动产所有权转让契据；动产抵押据
旧杂物义卖 (为教堂、学校或其他机构筹款)
有条件销售；有条件出售

bilingual.source: They have even asked governments to develop laws to stop the sale of shark fins.
bilingual.target: 他们甚至要求政府制定法律来禁止鱼翅的销售。

bilingual.source: The store is having a big sale.
bilingual.target: 这家商店正在进行大销售。

bilingual.source: The government regulates the sale of alcohol.
They want to ban the sale of alcohol after midnight.
bilingual.target: 他们想在午夜后禁止销售酒精。

bilingual.source: The unregulated sale of fireworks can be dangerous.
bilingual.target: 不受监管的烟花销售可能很危险。

bilingual.source: The new law places restrictions on the sale of alcohol.
bilingual.target: 新法律对酒精销售进行了限制。

bilingual.source: The product was rejected because it was unqualified for sale.
bilingual.target: 该产品因不合格而被拒绝销售。

bilingual.source: The company celebrated its millionth sale this year.
bilingual.target: 这家公司今年庆祝了它的第一百万次销售。

bilingual.source: The government restricts the sale of alcohol to certain hours.
bilingual.target: 政府限制酒类销售在特定时间内进行。

list.abstract: sale，英文单词，名词，作名词时意为“销售；出售；拍卖；销售额；廉价出售，人名；(意、塞、瑞典)萨莱；(英、萨摩)塞尔；(法)萨尔”。

yingyinNormal.en: It is the day of the jumble sale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 义卖活动的日子到了。

yingyinNormal.en: The sale went sour and that led to Nick's death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 交易谈崩，导致尼克把命给丢了。

yingyinNormal.en: So basically, this is a getting-rid-of-everything-Rachel-ever-used sale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本上这是“瑞秋碰过家具”大拍卖。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Well, you say that like it's a great sale day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你是说 今天卖得很不错喽

yingyinNormal.en: Look at my face! Do you still think it's a great sale day?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看我的表情！你还觉得今天卖得不错吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Let me hold that pretty little morning Rose. No. No. Okay, no sale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我抱抱可爱的小萝丝，不，不。好吧，算了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, right? Is there a sale at Barney's that nobody told us about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吧？是巴尼斯现在打折却没人告诉我们吗？

yingyinNormal.en: A black market site? Yeah, it's a marketplace for the sale of drugs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑市交易网站吗？知道，一个卖毒品的网店。

yingyinNormal.en: Very well. Hey, Comic-Con tickets go on sale this Firday. You can't buy one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常好，漫展的票这周五开卖，你不许买。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, we followed the guy to this garage sale, and they had the coolest stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反正呢，我们跟着他到了旧货出售摊儿，那卖的东西都超赞。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm there! Have a great day! I am handling the sale of our neighbor Jerry's house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我到了！祝你愉快！我在帮我们的邻居杰瑞卖房子。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, that's only 750. Everything's on sale. Really. Talk to me about that pocket watch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上售价只有七百五十美金而已，所有商品都打折。真的吗？给我介绍一下那块怀表吧。

yingyinNormal.en: My integrity is not for sale. Mine is. Maya! We owe your mother a hundred bucks. Put her there, partner!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的诚信不出售。我的出售。玛雅。我们欠你妈妈一百块钱呢。合作愉快，搭档。

yingyinNormal.en: Children. We are going to have a jumble sale. The money we raise will pay for a new school roof. Hurray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子们，我们将要举办一场义卖活动，义卖所得的钱，可以帮我换一个新的屋顶。太棒了！

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure you have a great excuse. What was it, a hair appointment? A mani-pedi? Was there a sale at Barneys?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我肯定你有个好借口。是什么，美发预约？修指甲还是Barney's大降价？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just inferring this is a couch because the evidence suggests the coffee table is having a tiny garage sale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我刚才有提到过这是沙发，因为证据表明咖啡桌上正在举办小型二手货贩卖。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll be shipping most of the animals for sale in North America. We can get freighter passage for the whole family.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我打算把园子里大部门动物装船去北美卖掉，全家也随货轮一起走。

yingyinNormal.en: The parents have arrived to pick up the children. Home time. Don't forget your old toys for the jumble sale tomorrow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 家长们都来接孩子回家啦！该回家啦！别忘了明天都带上你们的旧玩具来参加我们的义卖活动。

yingyinNormal.en: Well the prevailing theory was that the hijacking was a cover for the acquisition and sale of classified intelligence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最有可能的解释是，这起劫持是为了给获取和出售机密情报做掩护的幌子。

yingyinNormal.en: We must all give something to the jumble sale. I'm giving this hat and George is giving this ball. So what shall Daddy give?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们每个人都要拿点东西去义卖。我会拿这顶帽子，乔治呢会把他的球拿去义卖。那爸爸你要给什么呢？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the exchange of a commodity for money; the action of selling something

examination_example.sentence: As a condition of receiving state approval for the <highlight>sale</highlight>, the company agreed to seek permission from state regulators to operate past 2012.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为获得州政府批准出售的条件，该公司同意在2012年以后的运营需要征得州监管者的同意。

sense_info_list.en: a public or charitable event at which goods are sold; a public auction

examination_example.sentence: Suppose your class is to hold a charity <highlight>sale</highlight> for kids in need of help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你的班级将为那些需要帮助的孩子举办一场慈善义卖。

sense_info_list.en: an agreement or contract in which property is transferred from the seller or vendor to the buyer or vendee for a fixed price in money, paid or agreed to be paid by the buyer
an occasion for buying at specially reduced prices

word_usage.usage: sale可作可数名词，也可作不可数名词，表示“销售量”时，通常用复数形式，如：retail sales

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 女售货员；女营业员；女店员

word_family.mean: n. 卖；出售；廉价出售；贱卖；销售；拍卖；销售额；销售量；义卖；销售活动

sense_info_list.en: the exchange of a commodity for money; the action of selling something
a public or charitable event at which goods are sold; a public auction
an occasion for buying at specially reduced prices

word_usage.usage: sale是名词，注意与其动词sell作词性区分。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the exchange of a commodity for money; the action of selling something

examination_example.sentence: It contained money from her apartment <highlight>sale</highlight>, already planned for a down payment on a new home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有她出售公寓所得的钱，她已经计划用这些钱来支付新房子的首付。

examination_example.sentence: How did Sam Azar manage to complete the <highlight>sale</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 山姆·阿扎是如何完成这笔交易的?

examination_example.sentence: Once driverless cars are actually for <highlight>sale</highlight>, the early adopters will be the people who can afford to buy them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦无人驾驶汽车真正上市出售，最早使用它们的将是那些能买得起它们的人。

sense_info_list.en: an occasion for buying at specially reduced prices

word_usage.usage: sale是名词，注意与其动词sell作词性区分。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 出售；上市；折价销售；减价出售

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 女售货员；女营业员；女店员

word_family.mean: n. 卖；出售；廉价出售；贱卖；销售；拍卖；销售额；销售量；义卖；销售活动

examination_example.sentence: Around 100 people have already put down a $10, 000 deposit to get a Transition when they go on <highlight>sale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约有100人已经支付了10，000美元的订金，以便在上市时获得一辆Transition。

examination_example.sentence: Here, different types of tea are tasted by skilled tea-tasters before they are sold at each week's tea <highlight>sale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这里，不同种类的茶在每周的茶叶展销会上出售之前，会由有能力的品茶师品尝。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 女售货员；女营业员；女店员

word_family.mean: n. 卖；出售；廉价出售；贱卖；销售；拍卖；销售额；销售量；义卖；销售活动

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 面包或糕饼售买活动；糕饼义卖；义卖活动

sense_info_list.en: a public or charitable event at which goods are sold; a public auction

examination_example.sentence: Moved by their pictures, I decided to hold a charity (慈善) <highlight>sale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我被他们的照片所感动，所以我决定举行一次慈善出售。

examination_example.sentence: You can now have a yard <highlight>sale</highlight> for the things you no longer want.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你现在可以把你不再需要的东西进行庭院拍卖。

examination_example.sentence: We want to sell some of our things in a yard <highlight>sale</highlight> (庭院拍卖会) and give the money to a children's home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们想在庭院拍卖会上卖掉一些东西，把钱捐给儿童之家。

sense_info_list.en: the exchange of a commodity for money; the action of selling something

examination_example.sentence: She found a piece of land for <highlight>sale</highlight> and bought it with $5,000 she saved from years of babysitting (当临时保姆).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她找到一块要出售的土地，用多年来当临时保姆攒下的5000美元买下了它。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>sale</highlight> of a single piece can earn the young artist thousands of dollars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 销售一件作品可以给这位年轻的艺术家带来数千美元的收入。

sense_info_list.en: an occasion for buying at specially reduced prices

examination_example.sentence: The shopping center near my home is having a <highlight>sale</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我家附近的购物中心正在大减价。

examination_example.sentence: The fridges are on <highlight>sale</highlight> in the supermarket today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超市的冰箱今天减价出售。

examination_example.sentence: Some tomatoes and eggs are on <highlight>sale</highlight> in the supermarket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超市在出售一些西红柿和鸡蛋。

word_usage.usage: sale是名词，注意与其动词sell作词性区分。
